function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Job insecurity and financial concerns leading to poor mental health","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education on covid-19 safety measures","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Challenges to productivity due to pandemic-related factors","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lower wages and reduced availability of transportation services","category":"Wealth Distribution","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of international collaboration and information sharing on contagious disease outbreaks.","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Propagation of covid-19 due to human dominancy in the environment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Drastic climate change due to reduction of human dominancy in environment","category":"Climate Change","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nature rejuvenation leading to potential disruption of ecosystems","category":"Ecosystem Disruption","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Climate recovery may be temporary or reversed due to economic activities returning to normal","category":"Climate Change","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus has different survival times on different surfaces, posing a risk of surface transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation and infection of coronavirus impacted by environmental factors such as temperature and humidity.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Noise pollution affecting n100 million people in europe, leading to stress, elevated blood pressure, and other health issues.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased conflict between wildlife and urban areas due to human absence during lockdowns, leading to potential harm to both wildlife and humans.","category":"Wildlife Interaction","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased movement of wildlife in human-dominated areas","category":"Wildlife Interaction","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduction in human activity leading to wildlife encroachment","category":"Wildlife Interaction","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increase in airborne disease transmission due to improved air quality","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Introduction of cov-19 and social lockdowns leading to changes in environmental indices","category":"Environmental Impact","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Claims of covid-19 being a manufactured virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation about the nature of covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Linking covid-19 to natural catastrophic events","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controversial debate on the origin of covid-19 natural mutant vs bio-engineered","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extremities in pollution and unhygienic levels resulting from human activities","category":"Environmental Impact","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through close contact and body fluids","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission through contaminated objects","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inter-individual physical interaction","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of the virus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient prevention measures for viral transmission","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within commercial buildings due to changes in job dynamics and procedures.","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Participants impacted by an epidemic","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of participants directly involved in projects","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Survey data collected from multiple continents and countries, potentially increasing the risk of exposure to contagious diseases during data collection.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Variation in respondent locations and government directives, including legislation and it facilities for remote work, may contribute to differing levels of exposure and risk for contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close-ended and open-ended survey questions may lead to qualitative and quantitative data collection, potentially capturing complex and diverse perspectives on the impact of contagious diseases in the built environment.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of specific description of ’possible sample’ leading to sampling bias","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Adoption of easy random sampling without consideration of population characteristics","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependence on the central limit theorem for sample sizes greater than 30","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited sample size in the research","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of spss 25.0 for data analysis","category":"Tools&Apps","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelm of information leading to entropy of the system","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shift to unhealthy processed food consumption due to lack of nutritional guidelines for food parcels to the poor","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interrupted access to food for children from households that depend on school-feeding programmes due to school closures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Staggering loss of jobs and livelihoods leading to financial challenges in affording healthy foods","category":"Wealth Production","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exacerbation of unhealthy food consumption, physical inactivity, and sedentary behavior due to covid-19 control measures","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of nutritional knowledge, cooking skills, and guidelines for ensuring nutritional quality of food parcels to the poor","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Operational limitations during an outbreak leading to inconsistent methodology and small sample size","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited air sampling volume and dilution of airborne sars-cov-2 in the room","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher susceptibility to covid-19 among immigrants","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disparities in vaccination rates among immigrant groups","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in covid-19 risk and mortality among immigrant groups based on region of origin","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases due to increased interaction in the labor market","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
